text: Nza Tairan kim, kem maaŋ thav sir za mbuim, nza Tair ŋgu bakɨme thav veri. Nza verim, Zisas khothɨgap ana zɨn vui gumgi gu mbigi, mbe wari won muuiŋ gum tarir kov, nzan kov mba ŋgu bakɨme thav kɨrar hegap, veri. Mbe nzan kov, verav mbasɨk taan vergim, nza maam thɨvi phɨra fegap, nza mbe phorga Fhe Bakɨme phorga nzuai.
